DataListSpec.Name: ScannerLog Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Data list of records from Letter Scanner Log.
DataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_LETTER_SCANNER_LOG as set nocount on;
select isc.NAME as LETTERFULLNAME, lsl.SCANOUTCOME, lsl.[DESCRIPTION], lsl.LOGTYPE, c.NAME as SPONSOR, sc.NAME as CHILD, sl.NAME as CHILDPROJECT, au.USERNAME, lsl.SCANSESSION, lsl.SEQUENCEID, lsl.ORIGINALSEQUENCEID, lsl.CANCELLATIONREASON, lsl.DATESPONSORSHIPCANCELLED, lsl.NUMBEROFDAYSSPONSORED from dbo.USR_LETTERSCANNERLOG lsl join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD sc on lsl.childid = sc.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = sc.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = lsl.sponsorid join dbo.CHANGEAGENT au on lsl.addedbyid = au.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION sl on sl.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID join dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY isc on lsl.LETTERSUBCATEGORYID = isc.ID order by lsl.DATEADDED desc --where CONTEXTID = @CONTEXTID
